title: New: Michael Parallax – Growing Splendid / Grand
content:
Michael Parallax has been making beautiful music for several years now, with his Bandcamp discography proving mightily impressive. Having shot to blog-fame recently as one half of Florida duo Saes, Michael Parallax has released two new tracks of his own, stunning, folk-orientated Growing Splendid, and the more experimental, electronic, Grand. Lyrically, these two tracks are as accomplished as ever, “I don’t talk to ghosts. I can still see them.
I can hear them laugh at me when I’m talking to the ceiling” (Growing Splendid) and “You’ll be the wave of the ocean / I’ll be the path of emotion”. Check out both tracks below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
